alert.note: Alert for Coastal Duval; Coastal Nassau; South Central Duval; Trout River; Western Duval (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 09 at 1:58PM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Duval County through 230 PM EST... At 157 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Arlington, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Jacksonville, Unf, Arlington, Neptune Beach, Baymeadows, Craig Field, San Pablo, Little Talbot Island, Fort Caroline and Nas Jax. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Duval; Coastal Nassau; South Central Duval; Trout River; Western Duval
